reviewText: With OK subtitles......very good show. Waiting for final Season 6 next month-February 14, 2017

Unbelievably brilliant series.... Never expected the French would produce something like this, but they did.
It's a pity it probably will never be released in English (or at least with decent subtitles...) and the dialogues in German are not spoken by real Germans, but this is a very minor issue in what is otherwise an unexpected experience.
If you understand French, buy it
Only the first season has subtitles. The others don't even have subtitles for the deaf.
An engrossing depiction of the German occupation of France and its effect on the lives of the French.
